ComicInfo.Summary: In this issue, Hugs and Tugs, two young Care Bears, feel like nobody cares and end up with two kids who feel the same way. And when Tugs throws a story star in the air, the four friends see the story of the first Care Bear in “The Very First Care Bear,” “Goodbye to Peaceful Valley” and “How It Will Be.”
